name: CRABTAZOID 5000
description:
Submission for the Kaijujam 2. Play as the Almighty Crustancean : Crabtazoid 5000 and fight through army of human to  your victory.

Control
A/D - Walk

Left Mouse - Launch Claw

Right Mouse - Fire Gun

Finger cross that there no bug lol but if you have any suggestion or bug report feel free to comment it out!
